events.title: üêß Welcome to KRWL! Fork this repo to add YOUR community
events.description: Welcome to KRWL Community Events! Visit us at: krwl.in/ (homepage) | krwl.in/antarctica (South Pole demo) | krwl.in/hof, /nbg, /bth, /selb, /rawetz (German regions). Unknown regions redirect to 404. Fork https://github.com/feileberlin/krwl-hof to create your own community events platform!

events.title: üêß Emperor Penguin Parade ‚Äî Live now at the Pole!
events.description: Join the daily penguin parade at the ceremonial South Pole marker! Watch as our feathered friends waddle past in their natural tuxedos. Hot cocoa provided (you'll need it at -40¬∞C). This is a demo event - fork this repo to add real events from your community!

events.title: üåå Aurora Australis Viewing Party ‚Äî Starting soon!
events.description: Bundle up for the spectacular Southern Lights! Scientists and visitors gather to watch nature's greatest light show. Telescopes available. Warning: Temperatures may drop to -60¬∞C. Fork this repo to bring community events to YOUR neighborhood!

events.title: üßä Antarctic Ice Sculpture Contest ‚Äî Join the creativity!
events.description: Annual ice sculpture competition at the world's coldest art gallery! Participate or vote for your favorite frozen masterpiece. Tools and ice blocks provided. Perfect for community builders who want to shape something new - like YOUR OWN community events platform! Fork the repo today!

events.title: üèä Polar Plunge Challenge ‚Äî Brave the Antarctic waters!
events.description: The bravest tradition in Antarctica! Jump into the -2¬∞C waters and join the exclusive Polar Plunge Club. Warm towels and hot drinks waiting. Just like taking the plunge to fork this repo and start your own community events platform!

events.title: üî¨ Climate Science Lecture Series ‚Äî Learn about the ice!
events.description: Weekly lecture by Antarctic researchers sharing discoveries about climate, glaciology, and polar ecosystems. Q&A session included. Knowledge is power - use it to fork this repo and build awareness tools for YOUR community!

events.title: üßò Midnight Sun Yoga ‚Äî 24 hours of daylight wellness!
events.description: Experience yoga under the eternal Antarctic summer sun! No sunset for months means yoga anytime. Heated dome, all skill levels welcome. Stretch your limits - then stretch into building your own community platform by forking this repo!

events.title: üåç Start Your Own Colony! ‚Äî Community Builders Meetup
events.description: Calling all pioneers! Learn how to fork this repository and create your own community events platform. Whether you're in Berlin, Tokyo, or Buenos Aires - every community deserves local event discovery. Contact us at https://github.com/feileberlin/krwl-hof to claim your territory!

events.title: üêï Husky Sledding Adventure ‚Äî Mush through the ice!
events.description: Experience traditional polar exploration with our friendly husky team! 5km guided tour across pristine Antarctic ice. Just like these huskies pull the sled, YOU can pull your community together with a local events platform - fork this repo!

events.title: üè† Igloo Building Workshop ‚Äî Construct your shelter!
events.description: Learn the ancient art of building ice shelters from expert polar guides. All materials provided (there's plenty of snow!). Build something amazing - then build your own community platform by forking this repository!

note: Demo events at the South Pole! Fork https://github.com/feileberlin/krwl-hof to create your own community events platform
